verbs.description: ryan [ARG0: brasier] [ARG1: matt] [V: barnes] [ARGM-PRD: in mix] [ARGM-PRP: to potentially replace craig kimbrel] the craig kimbrel question is n't coming out of the blue kimbrel has always figured to be one of the tougher decisions when he hits the free agent market which will be in the coming weeks he a closer who is likely in line to set a record for largest contract given to a player at his position most likely surpassing aroldis chapman five - year 86 million deal the red sox will likely extend a qualifying offer to kimbrel which would pay the aroldis chapman matt boston red sox barnes matt barnes brasier jeurys familia entercom radio zach britton red sox craig kimbrel dave dombrowski ryan brasier
